name: Subject 74
description:
Subject 74 has escaped from a secret laboratory and is on the run from a nefarious scientist. Help run through the city and collect powerups so that Subject 74 can be free of his captors and their awful experiments.

Made during their first year (2021) at Otago Polytechnic by Samuel Galloway, Thomas Beckwith and Jarvis Wallace.

Supported by Tutors: Stef Animal and Edwin McRae
